Author: Shipowner.io
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [SHIP] | shipowner.io | Anyone Anywhere Anytime can be a ship owner
Body: shipowner.io - Anyone Anywhere Anytime can be a ship owner Token sale starts on March 7, 2018  Introduction:  Shipowner.io, is the world’s first distributed ledger platform for participation in capital financing of the $1.5 trillion assets market and $1 trillion a year services market in the maritime industry. Access to the platform is via SHIP (Shipping Industry Participations) tokens. Anyone, anywhere, at any time can now participate in any part of a capital structure backed by real-world maritime assets and services. This platform democratizes the way ships are owned, sold and operated.  Download whitepaper here ==> https://shipowner.io/whitepaper Download lightpaper here ==> https://shipowner.io/lightpaper  Token Sale:  The total token supply fixed at 1.5 billion (1,500,000,000) SHIPs, of which: 825M Phased Sales 450M Reserve & Early Adopters 225M Development, Team & Partners  Phase 1: Officer of Watch Price ==> 1 ETH = 500 SHIPs | Supply ==> 25,000,000 Phase 2: Lieutenant Price ==> 1 ETH = 475 SHIPs | Supply ==> 175,000,000 Phase 3: Master & Commander Price ==> 1 ETH = 450 SHIPs | Supply ==> 275,000,000 Phase 4: Fleet Admiral Price ==> 1 ETH = 425 SHIPs | Supply ==> 350,000,000  Website: https://shipowner.io/ Whitepaper: https://shipowner.io/whitepaper Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/GFj1kRLHeuYnLL8MN2wpBA Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shipownerio-549710902069644/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/@shipownerio LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/18465446/ Contact Email: info@shipowner.io
